to Oprah Winfrey on her Master Class show, the 51-year-old music mogul recalled being kicked out of a meeting with an unknown network executive while trying to sell the singing competition with then-partners Simon Fuller and Simon Cowell Jones. It was so bad that a minute into the pitch the guy said "No'. To wind him up, I said,` So, it sounds like you're interested?' He said` Get out' and we were thrown out of the network. "I turned to the other Simons and said,` The good news is, it will never get worse than this"...[ I left with] my tail between my legs.
